column2: Create a walletconnect pair by manually connecting to a wc url.

column1: Create pair with on-screen QR scanner
column2: Create a walletconnect pair by scanning a QR with the on-screen QR scanner.

column1: Create pair with camera QR scanner
column2: Create a walletconnect pair by scanning a QR with the camera QR scanner.
Disconnect a pairing by removing it from the WalletConnect Pairing List.

column1: Disconnect a pairing from third-party app
column2: Disconnect a pairing by removing it from third-party application and verify its removal from the Pairing List.
An expired pairing cannot be used to start a session.
Approve a session and verify the acknowledged session in the WalletConnect Sessions List.
Reject a session and verify inactive pairing.
An expired session cannot be used to send requests.
Approve a request and verify is has been approved.
Reject a request and verify it has been rejected.

column1: Pairings and sessions are deleted on delete cache
column2: Delete cache and verify pairings and sessions are deleted.

column1: Pairings and sessions are deleted on wallet reset
column2: Reset and reinitialize wallet and verify pairings and sessions are deleted.
